text.0_Verse: A psalm of David, after he battled Goliath.
text.1_Verse: Young I was in the midst of my brothers, and a lad in my father’s house.
text.2_Verse: A shepherd of my father’s flock, driving his herd in the wilderness.
text.3_Verse: My hands performed upon a lute, my fingers worked a lyre.
text.4_Verse: And who can tell Adonai? Adonai – He will hear.
text.5_Verse: He sent His messenger, and took me from after my father’s flock.
text.6_Verse: And He anointed me with anointing oil, and appointed me a prince of my people.
text.7_Verse: My brothers are good and strong, but them Adonai did not desire.
text.8_Verse: He took me out towards the Philistine, who cursed me through his idols.
text.9_Verse: And I tore off his sword, and cut off his head, and removed reproach from the children of Israel.
